title: Our Thing with Sammy The Bull - S1 Episode 7: The Commission Hit
description:
Salvatore "Sammy the Bull" Gravano (born March 12, 1945) is an American gangster who became the underboss of the Gambino crime family. This is his story. Directed by James Carroll.

Sammy receives the biggest job of his life. The entire commission comes together and requests Sammy take out Johnny Keys.
